favourite.article: Praise the Lord for He first loved us so we can now enjoy Him as our bountiful supply in our daily living. According to the summer training message, He's our master, we will not go out free because He's such an unique one—a master who's not coming to be served but to serve us. Through His serving, we are willing to humble ourselves and take Christ as our pattern to serve in the church life. Thank You Lord Jesus for taking on humanity and being such a pattern! I do love You.
Lord Jesus...I love You coz You love me first.
This is one of my turning song! Thank the Lord for His Body!!! Hallelujah for the Body!! Thank the Lord I'm part of His glorious, wonderful body!!!
I love You Lord!
Lord, how I thank You...and I LOVE YOU SO MUCH!
Makatandog jud ni nga hym... Salamat Ginoo sa imong gugma namo.. Oh Ginoong Hesus..

This song really touches me especially when I am feeling down about myself. He allows us to confess our sins so that we do not have anymore guilty stains. And He even died for me. That is why I love Him.

This is a really touching and powerful song!
O Lord! That's why I love You!! I love You, Triune God!!!
Amen.

I feel really encouraged by this song. He bled for ME. For the longest time I felt hopeless because I was just so sinful, how could God possibly love such a sinner? But He loved us so much He died for me. That's why I love Him.
The Lord's love surpasses all we know and all we will ever know. What can we say but Lord Jesus, we want to love You with our best love.
I want to love, treasure, and give my life and all to the Lord because He came and died for me. Amen.
Praise the Lord saints! This is the loving God we have. Lord, I give my life and all to You!

It really touches my heart to love the Lord more. It moves me to its highest sense, to such an extent that I found myself crying. I don't know why, maybe because it reflects the story of my life (first two paragraphs) before. Until the time that the Lord revealed Himself. He is the great God, the highest One yet He took on humanity. He was hung on a tree. He died there just for me. I am a sinner yet He came for me. He bore all my sins. He is the eternal God yet He chose to be limited by time and space to save me. The Lord shows us how great His love toward us. He loved us to such an extent that He died for us.--That's why I love Him. That's why I treasure Him. That's why I give my life and all to Him.
Lord, we love You. I enjoy the song and feel so good that there are so many of us loving Him.

God was far away from me!! Great and highest One is He! Yet!!!!! He took on humanity! He came for me!!! He hung on a tree!!!! All those things were done because of me! And that's why I love him!! because all I could want, I can find in HIM! Love, grace, comprenhension!!! All! Jesus is our Lord!!! Hallelujah!

That's why we love You. That's why we treasure You. That's why we give our lives and all for You. Because You loved us first and gave Yourself for us rebellious sinners. Thank You, Lord Jesus! May we give each moment, each day, and every detail of our lives to You for Your desire on this earth. We love You, Lord!

This hymn reminds me of what I am before the Lord. I am nothing and not worthy in His eyes but because of His unmeasurable love He saves from this world of vanities. What I can only say: Lord, I love You in return.

O my life of misery, In the world of vanity, As I searched for happiness, My reward I received just emptiness.
Thank the Lord that the time I searched again, I found Him and I received emptiness no more..
It's nice to think that I received Him, and not just even me but also you.
I really appreciate this song!!!!

This song really have touched me when I first sang it in the year-end training. it tells us to love and treasure the Lord, giving everything to the Lord. Saints, how we need to be those who are pure in heart and who are pure and single for the Lord's goal, with a heart that seeks only the Lord.

Dear saints, no matter how high our spiritual attainments may be, as long as we are still in the old creation, if we do not remain in the fellowship with God, we are capable of being in the flesh and of behaving like the worldly people. That is why we need to love Him. Amen.

This song is so wonderful in that it simply describes what we were. I would still live in vanity without God's love. Praise the Lord! The great and highest One took on humanity, was hung on a tree, and bled there to die for me! Lord, I love You.
Great songs but it would be nice if they played all the way through.
This song has touched me. O, we are so blessed and loved by God. No matter how sinful we are, Lord still loves us. O Hallelujah!!!!

I've fallen in love while listening to this song because just the meaning of it is so especially touching. Instead of thinking too much about my sinful past, I can put my conscience to rest because the Lord came for me, hung on a tree, and bled there to die for me. Lord, I want to love You all of my days.
I love this song because it reminds me that no matter how sinful I am, the Lord forgave me and even sacrifice His life for me. Lord I love You so much.

I had failed Him in my Christian life and my past is full of sins. Yet the Lord came to redeem me at the cost of His life. After listening to this song, my faith is Him has been restored and reassured that His blood is able to forgive and cleanse me from all my sins and unrighteousness.

Lord I just love You and treasure You! even though I was a sinner, but praise You for saving me and made me part of Your eternal plan. Lord now I enjoy You as my manna daily. Lord Jesus, I love You.....
I just love you Lord!

I like this song because it reminds me who I really was and that helps me to make more valuable my salvation and all what God Himself had to do to forgive my sins. That is why I love Him and give my life and all to Him.
